summary: Accomplished start-up leader, hands-on Investment focused CEO/COO/CFO and entrepreneur who has successfully developed and implemented corporate strategy from a business and financial perspective, trusted business partner and advisor to CEO’s and entrepreneurs. Seasoned at working in rapidly growing start-ups, specializes in early growth stage strategy, positioning, revenue model development & new business development in companies. Innovative business strategist gifted at cultivating strategic alliances, developing multiple revenue streams within cutting edge technology environments and successfully executed corporate transactions including M&A (buy-side and sell-side), capital raises and restructuring.Proven revenue generator, recognized for the ability to inspire, engage and collaborate with executives and peers; leverage resources, direct reports, and building world class sales organizations. Driven negotiator known for exceeding sales, margin and cost targets. Specialties: Strategic positioning & Financial Analysis: Business planning based on strong financial matrices, developing agendas for scalable explosive growth, strategic alliances geared to utilize cross-platform opportunities, optimizing monetization & strategic synergy. Creative & innovative visionary, proven industry analyst, talented at evaluating new markets, business opportunities and cutting-edge technologies with goal to assist companies who are currently performing below their potential to overcome challenges and increase their growth and revenue. Through an infusion of expertise, management and capital directed towards assisting companies with the introduction and commercialization of their technologies to their relevant market and turning existing companies around.
